ygData.subject: Re: Whats going on?
ygData.msgSnippet: UUNet (EQ s ISP) is having a major router problem in San Diego....the same city all of the servers are located.  You can read the current status at
ygData.messageBody:
UUNet (EQ's ISP) is having a major router problem in San Diego....the same
city all of the servers are located. You can read the current status at
http://www.noc.uu.net As of 1:40am EST, the status is:

UUNET is currently experiencing packet loss and
latency in our San Diego and
LAX POP. This outage
is affecting some our dedicated
customers. Senior
Engineers are currently working
with remote hands
technicians to resolve the
problem.

Munk



At 12:29 AM 3/21/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: mark@...
>
>Anyone else having a bitch of a time getting on? All Ive heard is that
>a router was down in CA.. anyone else have any info?
>
>Thanks
>
>mark
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

>Mark E. Davis The Universe replied,'However that
>Mark@... does not create in me any sense of
> obligation.' --Stephen Crane
